title: Too many cheaters
body:

Plat is so trash right now. I can just imagine mid-diamond these days. Must be like 2-4 minute open mids still.

replies.body: I've never experienced any of those. Boosters maybe, but it's hard to tell because you can get matched against someone better than you that just out plays the shit out of you and makes you look boosted.

outplays are nice.

Scripts are very obvious. very, very obvious. Irregular and exact movements around, for example, a skillshot. Most people dont hold one key to play. Right clicks differ from automated, smooth movement through memory editing. like arcing around the exact outer edges of a tornado hitbox in super speed.

S-U-PP-O-R-T ticket

I have experienced all of the above personally in bronze queue i think it might just be the servers or maybe the people ur talking about are making smurfs after getting banned.

Can riot IP ban/permanent ban? only bans ive seen are like muting someone for 24 hrs. my friend got permanent banned for flaming and he just made another acc back at it in a week.

IP bans affect people they are not supposed to (like different people in the same house or for example an entire collage dorm) and are very, very easy to circumvent. If you want to get around an IP ban unplug your modem and plug it back in. That is literally all it takes.

Punishments go in tiers first there are two chat bans, then a 14 day suspension, then a permanent suspension.
